comment: Controlling a portion of the center and putting pressure on the queenside.
Developing a piece and preventing 2. e4.

moves: 1. d4 Nf6 2. Nd2 e5 3. dxe5 Ng4
comment: If 4. Ngf3 then 4... Nc6 will win back the pawn. Not 4. f4 Ne3 trapping the queen.

moves: 1. d4 Nf6 2. Nd2 e5 3. dxe5 Ng4 4. h3
comment: An innocent looking move. White expects 4... Nxe5 5. Ngf3

moves: 1. d4 Nf6 2. Nd2 e5 3. dxe5 Ng4 4. h3 Ne3
comment: White resigns. If 5. fxe3 then 5. ...Qh4+ 6. g3 Qxg3#
